name: Jak and Daxter Collection
description:
The Dynamic Duo is Back!
The Jak and Daxter Collection™ features all three best-selling PlayStation®2 classic hits: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy®, Jak II™ and Jak 3™ fully remastered in high definition, stereoscopic 3D and with Trophy support. This collection follows the adventures of fan favorite Jak and his friend Daxter through a series of action packed adventures. The Jak and Daxter Collection™ blends action, shooting, driving, and action platformer into one complete PS3™ package.
Each game will be a separate download.
